proposal: Diving into the world of DOCCOMMUNITY, it's clear you're reshaping how we think about community governance and liquidity with your MB Pass and DMLA Protocol. Congrats on reaching 31 holders in the ETH network! 🎉 If you're looking to amplify your MetaBTC Products, our suite of B2B tools, including a customizable DEX and a blockchain-based lottery, could seamlessly integrate with your vision, allowing your community to deploy and benefit directly. Let's make liquidity not just decentralized but also rewarding.
